titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate 77416 as the single, unique ZIP Code for Sargent, Texas, and for other purposes.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate 77416 as the single, unique ZIP Code for Sargent, Texas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S Postal Service to designate 77416 as the single, unique ZIP Code for Sargent, Texas.
